cause.description:
Lights Out NYC is an organization aimed to raise money to advertise and hold an hour on October 22nd, 2007, from 8:00-9:00 PM, where the entire city will turn out its lights. This will save an enormous amount of energy and will create an unforgettable scene.
Join to pledge you will turn out your lights at this hour.
WEBSITE: sixwhiskers.com/lights
THE DATE IS NO LONGER OCTOBER 22ND AND WILL BE CHANGED SOON!
1. Global warming is an occuring situation
2. Energy is an overused privilege
3. The effects of global warming are huge
cause.mission: Our mission is to have an hour of darkness in New York City to save energy
cause.name: Lights Out NYC
